titles.title: A resolution designating September 9, 2009, as "National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day".
A resolution designating September 9, 2009, as "National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates September 9, 2009, as National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day.
Calls upon the people of the United States to observe a moment of reflection on the ninth hour of September 9, 2009, to remember that during the 9 months of pregnancy a woman should not consume alcohol.
